articles.title: Malaysia, Pakistan explore digital finance alliance in push for Sharia-compliant innovation
articles.author: Our Correspondent
articles.summary: Mohamad Bin Haji Hasan met with Bilal Bin Saqib, CEO of the Pakistan Crypto Council. The initiative is positioned to serve as a model for member states of the Organisation of Islamic Cooperation.
